channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Watch The World’s Largest Iceberg Escape Into The Ocean
item.description: "Megaberg" iceberg A23a is on the move again after making a slow escape from Antarctica. Satellites are tracking the jumbo berg's drift into the South...

item.title: Why GM Ditched Cruise Driverless: Software-Driven Cars Mean Big Bucks
item.description: Here's one reason why GM ditched Cruise robotaxis: carmakers will earn more than half of their revenue from software and digital services by 2035.

item.title: The opportunity for AI formbots

item.title: A Year In Climate Negotiations - 2024 Wins, Losses And What Lies Ahead
item.description: 2024 marked a watershed year for global climate negotiations, with historic breakthroughs in financing and renewed tensions over loss and damage.
